items.text: guides to backward point with an open face
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full, slogged to deep midwicket from outside off
guided to point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: shaftab: "AKSHAY, there is a mistake @ 29.3 overs, it is not Sabbir Rahman on the pitch yet." Has been changed, than you.
items.text: fuller, worked to deep midwicket
spins in rap the pad outside off
items.shortText: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: spins in sharply to hit him high on the pad. This pitch is starting to seriously grip and turn now: every ball doing something
items.shortText: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye

items.text: guided to midwicket with a closed face
now he opens the face and guides to slip on the bounce
flicked to short fine

items.preText: Nisarg: "A difference between a good team and great team is strike rotation but not scoring boundaries. It seems crazy but naked truth. Bangladesh is good team. "
items.text: full on the stumps, pats it to the right of the bowler
pulled between long-on and deep midwicket
reaches out for a big hit outside off and misses
sliding into the pads, gets a leading edge to the off side
sliding on the pads, clipped to square leg
spins away outside off as he comes forward to block
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: worked behind square with the turn
tucked off the pads behind square leg
worked into the on side with the turn
length on leg stump, tucked to deep backward square leg
minimal turn as he flicks through square leg
pitched up outside off, worked into the on side
items.shortText: Gayle to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: advances down the ground and tries to heave over the leg side and gets a leading edge over extra cover
edged and did it carry? Oh, yes.. dropped Gayle puts down a sitter at first sip. Grabs at it and fails to get down completely as Mahmudullah presses forward and gets an edge
driven to extra cover
